a machine readable transcription

revisionDesc.change: added schematron declaration, updated schema declaration, changed text type to annotations

body.p:
The idea (illustrated by Kant) that it isn't those who travel the most that know the most, or think the deepest, widest, clearest. I even think that sometimes a life devoted to persistent travel is a squan-
der'dsquandered life. The Knowingest people I have met have been not been the gad-abouts
